original_title: Parliament votes to debate VAT (Amendment) Bill today
original_body_lines: The Value Added Tax (Amendment) Bill is scheduled to be taken up for debate this evening (11 Dec.) in the House, as per a parliamentary vote held in this regard.
The proposal to debate the Bill today was passed in Parliament this morning after 92 MPs voted in favour and 41 against, while one MP abstained during the vote.
Accordingly, the VAT (Amendment) Bill will be taken up for debate this evening after the debate on the 2024 Budget.
